songs.title: Beautiful Now (Zonderling Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse: Jon Bellion]
I see what you're wearing, there's nothing beneath it
Forgive me for staring, forgive me for breathing
We might not know why, we might not know how
But baby, tonight, we're beautiful now

[Chorus: Jon Bellion]
We might not know why, we might not know how
But baby, tonight, we're beautiful now
We'll light up the sky, we'll open the clouds
'Cause baby, tonight, we're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We'll light up the sky, we'll open the clouds
'Cause baby, tonight, we're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now

[Chorus: Jon Bellion]
We might not know why, we might not know how
But baby, tonight, we're beautiful now
We'll light up the sky, we'll open the clouds
'Cause baby, tonight, we're beautiful now
We're beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautif-
We're beautiful
We're beautiful now
We're beautiful now
